name: Push and Pull (Green Cheese Games)
description:
Push and Pull is a puzzle game designed around assembling and moving blocks.  You control a player core with the ability to attach itself to blocks like pistons and magnets, which you can use to navigate the level.  However, it will take careful planning to succeed.  Don’t let your failures pull you down, push your way to victory!

Controls:

Left Click - Activate Block

Right Click - Deactivate Block

R - Restart Level

Game Created by: Jacob Sharp

Music: "Among Machines" by Snabisch
